EmailTemplate.name: VHM Survey.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Win $50 Amazon Gift Card: VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, You are receiving this email because you recently download VMTurbo's free & unlimited Virtual Health Monitor. Please complete this Virtual Health Monitor Survey <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1-msW1aCoeKqdoTkyZvqHqJol9YF3OuVjyg3NX8PDqgY/viewform?usp=send_form> by July 1, and be entered to win a $50 Amazon Gift Card. Thank you, {{lead.First Name:default=}}. - Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
